00023 #include <Champ_Face_implementation.h>

00028 
00029 DoubleTab& Champ_Face_implementation::valeur_aux_elems(const DoubleTab& positions,
00030                                                        const IntVect& les_polys,
00031                                                        DoubleTab& val) const
00032 {
00033   const Champ_base& cha=le_champ();
00034   int nb_compo_=cha.nb_comp();
00035   if (val.nb_dim() == 2)
00036     {
00037       assert((val.dimension(0) == les_polys.size())||(val.dimension_tot(0) == les_polys.size()));
00038       assert(val.dimension(1) == nb_compo_);
00039     }
00040   else
00041     {
00042       Cerr << "Erreur TRUST dans Champ_Face_implementation::valeur_aux_elems()" << finl;
00043       Cerr << "Le DoubleTab val n'a pas 2 entrees" << finl;
00044       Process::exit();
00045     }
00046 
00047   const Zone_VDF& zone_VDF = zone_vdf();
00048 // const Zone& zone_geom = zone_VDF.zone();
00049   const IntTab& face_sommets = zone_VDF.face_sommets();
00050   const IntTab& elem_faces = zone_VDF.elem_faces();
00051   double psi,val1,val2;
00052   int som0,som1;
00053   int le_poly;
00054 
00055   const DoubleTab& ch = cha.valeurs();
00056   const Domaine& dom=zone().domaine();
00057 
00058   if (nb_compo_ == 1)
00059     {
00060       for(int rang_poly=0; rang_poly<les_polys.size(); rang_poly++)
00061         {
00062           le_poly=les_polys(rang_poly);
00063           if (le_poly == -1)
00064             val(rang_poly, 0) = 0;
00065           else
00066             for(int dir=0; dir<Objet_U::dimension; dir++)
00067               {
00068                 int face1 = elem_faces(le_poly,dir);
00069                 int face2 = elem_faces(le_poly,Objet_U::dimension+dir);
00070                 val1 = ch(face1);
00071                 val2 = ch(face2);
00072 
00073                 som0 = face_sommets(face1,0);
00074                 som1 = face_sommets(face2,0);
00075 
00076                 psi = ( positions(rang_poly,dir) - dom.coord(som0,dir) )
00077                       / ( dom.coord(som1,dir) - dom.coord(som0,dir) ) ;
00078                 if (est_egal(psi,0) || est_egal(psi,1))
00079                   val(rang_poly,0) = interpolation(val1,val2,psi);
00080               }
00081         }
00082     }
00083   else //!< (nb_compo_ != 1) */
00084     {
00085       for(int rang_poly=0; rang_poly<les_polys.size(); rang_poly++)
00086         {
00087           le_poly=les_polys(rang_poly);
00088           if (le_poly == -1)
00089             for(int ncomp=0; ncomp<nb_compo_; ncomp++)
00090               val(rang_poly,ncomp) = 0;
00091           else
00092             for(int ncomp=0; ncomp<nb_compo_; ncomp++)
00093               {
00094 
00095                 val1 = ch(elem_faces(le_poly,ncomp));
00096                 val2 = ch(elem_faces(le_poly,Objet_U::dimension+ncomp));
00097 
00098                 som0 = face_sommets(elem_faces(le_poly,ncomp),0);
00099                 som1 = face_sommets(elem_faces(le_poly,Objet_U::dimension+ncomp),0);
00100 
00101                 psi = ( positions(rang_poly,ncomp) - dom.coord(som0,ncomp) )
00102                       / ( dom.coord(som1,ncomp) - dom.coord(som0,ncomp) ) ;
00103                 val(rang_poly,ncomp) = interpolation(val1,val2,psi);
00104               }
00105         }
00106     }
00107   return val;
00108 }
00109 
00110 double Champ_Face_implementation::interpolation(const double val1, const double val2, const double psi) const
00111 {
00112   double epsilon=1.e-12;
00113   if (dabs(psi) < epsilon)
00114     return val1 ;
00115   else if (dabs(1.-psi) < epsilon)
00116     return val2 ;
00117   else
00118     return val1 + psi * (val2-val1) ;
00119 }
00120 
00121 DoubleVect& Champ_Face_implementation::valeur_aux_elems_compo(const DoubleTab& positions,
00122                                                               const IntVect& les_polys,
00123                                                               DoubleVect& val,
00124                                                               int ncomp) const
00125 {
00126   const Champ_base& cha = le_champ();
00127   int nb_compo_ = cha.nb_comp();
00128   assert(val.size() == les_polys.size());
00129   int le_poly;
00130   double psi,val1,val2;
00131   int som0,som1;
00132 
00133   const Zone_VDF& zone_VDF = zone_vdf();
00134 // const Zone& zone_geom = zone_VDF.zone();
00135   const IntTab& face_sommets = zone_VDF.face_sommets();
00136   const IntTab& elem_faces = zone_VDF.elem_faces();
00137   const DoubleTab& ch = cha.valeurs();
00138   const Domaine& dom=zone().domaine();
00139 
00140   if (nb_compo_ == 1)
00141     {
00142       Cerr<<"Champ_Face_implementation::valeur_aux_elems_compo"<<finl;
00143       Cerr <<"A scalar field cannot be of Champ_Face type." << finl;
00144       Process::exit();
00145     }
00146   else //!< (nb_compo_ != 1)
00147     {
00148       for(int rang_poly=0; rang_poly<les_polys.size(); rang_poly++)
00149         {
00150           le_poly=les_polys(rang_poly);
00151           if (le_poly == -1)
00152             val(rang_poly) = 0;
00153           else
00154             {
00155               val1 = ch(elem_faces(le_poly,ncomp));
00156               val2 = ch(elem_faces(le_poly,Objet_U::dimension+ncomp));
00157               som0 = face_sommets(elem_faces(le_poly,ncomp),0);
00158               som1 = face_sommets(elem_faces(le_poly,Objet_U::dimension+ncomp),0);
00159 
00160               psi = ( positions(rang_poly,ncomp) - dom.coord(som0,ncomp) )
00161                     / ( dom.coord(som1,ncomp) - dom.coord(som0,ncomp) ) ;
00162               val(rang_poly) = interpolation(val1,val2,psi);
00163             }
00164         }
00165     }
00166   return val;
00167 }
00168 
00169 DoubleVect& Champ_Face_implementation::valeur_a_elem(const DoubleVect& position,
00170                                                      DoubleVect& val,
00171                                                      int le_poly) const
00172 {
00173   const Zone_VDF& zone_VDF = zone_vdf();
00174   const Zone& zone_geom = zone();
00175   const IntTab& face_sommets = zone_VDF.face_sommets();
00176   const IntTab& elem_faces = zone_VDF.elem_faces();
00177   const Champ_base& cha=le_champ();
00178 
00179   double psi,val1,val2;
00180   int som0,som1;
00181   const DoubleTab& ch = cha.valeurs();
00182   int nb_compo_=cha.nb_comp();
00183   const Domaine& dom=zone_geom.domaine();
00184 
00185   if (nb_compo_ == 1)
00186     {
00187       Cerr<<"Champ_Face_implementation::valeur_a_elem"<<finl;
00188       Cerr <<"A scalar field cannot be of Champ_Face type." << finl;
00189       Process::exit();
00190     }
00191   else //!< (nb_compo_ != 1)
00192     {
00193       if (le_poly == -1)
00194         for(int ncomp=0; ncomp<nb_compo_; ncomp++)
00195           val(ncomp) = 0;
00196       else
00197         for(int ncomp=0; ncomp<nb_compo_; ncomp++)
00198           {
00199             val1 = ch(elem_faces(le_poly,ncomp));
00200             val2 = ch(elem_faces(le_poly,Objet_U::dimension+ncomp));
00201 
00202             som0 = face_sommets(elem_faces(le_poly,ncomp),0);
00203             som1 = face_sommets(elem_faces(le_poly,Objet_U::dimension+ncomp),0);
00204 
00205             psi = ( position(ncomp) - dom.coord(som0,ncomp) )
00206                   / ( dom.coord(som1,ncomp) - dom.coord(som0,ncomp) ) ;
00207 
00208             val(ncomp) = interpolation(val1,val2,psi);
00209           }
00210     }
00211   return val;
00212 }

00214 
00215 double Champ_Face_implementation::valeur_a_elem_compo(const DoubleVect& position,
00216                                                       int le_poly,int ncomp) const
00217 {
00218   const Zone_VDF& zone_VDF = zone_vdf();
00219   const Zone& zone_geom = zone();
00220   const IntTab& face_sommets = zone_VDF.face_sommets();
00221   const IntTab& elem_faces = zone_VDF.elem_faces();
00222   const Champ_base& cha = le_champ();
00223   int nb_compo_ = cha.nb_comp();
00224 
00225   double psi,val1,val2;
00226   double val = 0.;
00227   int som0,som1;
00228   const DoubleTab& ch = cha.valeurs();
00229   const Domaine& dom=zone_geom.domaine();
00230 
00231   if (nb_compo_ == 1)
00232     {
00233       Cerr<<"Champ_Face_implementation::valeur_a_elem_compo"<<finl;
00234       Cerr <<"A scalar field cannot be of Champ_Face type." << finl;
00235       Process::exit();
00236     }
00237   else //!< (nb_compo_ != 1)
00238     {
00239       if (le_poly == -1)
00240         return 0;
00241       else
00242         {
00243           val1 = ch(elem_faces(le_poly,ncomp));
00244           val2 = ch(elem_faces(le_poly,Objet_U::dimension+ncomp));
00245 
00246           som0 = face_sommets(elem_faces(le_poly,ncomp),0);
00247           som1 = face_sommets(elem_faces(le_poly,Objet_U::dimension+ncomp),0);
00248 
00249           psi = ( position(ncomp) - dom.coord(som0,ncomp) )
00250                 / ( dom.coord(som1,ncomp) - dom.coord(som0,ncomp) ) ;
00251           val = interpolation(val1,val2,psi);
00252         }
00253     }
00254   return val;
00255 }
00256 
00257 DoubleTab& Champ_Face_implementation::valeur_aux_sommets(const Domaine& dom,
00258                                                          DoubleTab& ch_som) const
00259 {
00260 // const Champ_base& cha_tmp=le_champ();
00261 // const DoubleTab& ch_tmp = cha_tmp.valeurs();
00262 
00263   const Champ_base& cha=le_champ();
00264   int nb_compo_=cha.nb_comp();
00265   const Zone& mazone = dom.zone(0);
00266 
00267 // int nb_elem = mazone.nb_elem();
00268   int nb_elem_tot = mazone.nb_elem_tot();
00269   int nb_som = mazone.nb_som();
00270   int nb_som_elem = mazone.nb_som_elem();
00271 // const DoubleTab& ch = cha.valeurs();
00272   IntVect compteur(nb_som);
00273   int ncomp;
00274   int num_elem,num_som,j;
00275   ch_som = 0;
00276   compteur = 0;
00277 
00278   if (nb_compo_ == 1)
00279     {
00280       Cerr<<"Champ_Face_implementation::valeur_aux_sommets"<<finl;
00281       Cerr <<"A scalar field cannot be of Champ_Face type." << finl;
00282       Process::exit();
00283     }
00284   else //!< (nb_compo_ != 1)
00285     {
00286       DoubleVect position(Objet_U::dimension);
00287       for (num_elem=0; num_elem<nb_elem_tot; num_elem++)
00288         for (j=0; j<nb_som_elem; j++)
00289           {
00290             num_som = mazone.sommet_elem(num_elem,j);
00291 
00292             for(int k=0; k<Objet_U::dimension; k++)
00293               position(k)=dom.coord(num_som,k);
00294             if(num_som < nb_som)
00295               {
00296                 compteur[num_som]++;
00297                 for (ncomp=0; ncomp<nb_compo_; ncomp++)
00298                   {
00299                     ch_som(num_som,ncomp) += valeur_a_elem_compo(position,num_elem,ncomp);
00300                   }
00301               }
00302           }
00303 
00304       for (num_som=0; num_som<nb_som; num_som++)
00305         for (ncomp=0; ncomp<nb_compo_; ncomp++)
00306           ch_som(num_som,ncomp) /= compteur[num_som];
00307     }
00308 
00309   return ch_som;
00310 }
00311 DoubleVect& Champ_Face_implementation::valeur_aux_sommets_compo(const Domaine& dom,
00312                                                                 DoubleVect& ch_som,
00313                                                                 int ncomp) const
00314 {
00315   const Champ_base& cha=le_champ();
00316   int nb_compo_=cha.nb_comp();
00317   const Zone& mazone = dom.zone(0);
00318 
00319 // int nb_elem = mazone.nb_elem();
00320   int nb_elem_tot = mazone.nb_elem_tot();
00321   int nb_som = mazone.nb_som();
00322   int nb_som_elem = mazone.nb_som_elem();
00323 // const DoubleTab& ch = cha.valeurs();
00324   IntVect compteur(nb_som);
00325   int num_elem,num_som,j;
00326   ch_som = 0;
00327   compteur = 0;
00328 
00329   if (nb_compo_ == 1)
00330     {
00331       Cerr<<"Champ_Face_implementation::valeur_aux_sommets_compo"<<finl;
00332       Cerr <<"A scalar field cannot be of Champ_Face type." << finl;
00333       Process::exit();
00334     }
00335   else //!< (nb_compo_ != 1)
00336     {
00337       DoubleVect position(Objet_U::dimension);
00338       for (num_elem=0; num_elem<nb_elem_tot; num_elem++)
00339         for (j=0; j<nb_som_elem; j++)
00340           {
00341             num_som = mazone.sommet_elem(num_elem,j);
00342             for(int k=0; k<Objet_U::dimension; k++)
00343               position(k)=dom.coord(num_som,k);
00344             if(num_som < nb_som)
00345               {
00346                 compteur[num_som]++;
00347                 ch_som(num_som) += valeur_a_elem_compo(position,num_elem,ncomp);
00348               }
00349           }
00350 
00351       for (num_som=0; num_som<nb_som; num_som++)
00352         ch_som(num_som) /= compteur[num_som];
00353     }
00354   return ch_som;
00355 }
00356 
00357 DoubleTab& Champ_Face_implementation::remplir_coord_noeuds(DoubleTab& positions) const
00358 {
00359   const Zone_VDF& la_zone_vdf = ref_cast(Zone_VDF,zone_dis_base());
00360   const DoubleTab& xv = la_zone_vdf.xv();
00361   int nb_fac = la_zone_vdf.nb_faces_tot();
00362   if ( (xv.dimension(0) == nb_fac ) && (xv.dimension(1) == Objet_U::dimension) )
00363     positions.ref(xv);
00364   else
00365     {
00366       Cerr << "Erreur dans Champ_Face::remplir_coord_noeuds()" << finl;
00367       Cerr << "Les centres de gravite des faces n'ont pas ete calcules" << finl;
00368       Process::exit();
00369     }
00370   return positions;
00371 }
00372 
00373 int Champ_Face_implementation::remplir_coord_noeuds_et_polys(DoubleTab& positions,
00374                                                              IntVect& polys) const
00375 {
00376   const IntTab& face_voisins = zone_vdf().face_voisins();
00377   int nb_faces=zone_vdf().nb_faces();
00378   remplir_coord_noeuds(positions);
00379   polys.resize(nb_faces);
00380 
00381   for(int face=0; face<nb_faces; face++)
00382     if( (polys(face)=face_voisins(face,0)) == -1)
00383       polys(face)=face_voisins(face,1);
00384   return 1;
00385 }
00386 
00387 int Champ_Face_implementation::imprime_Face(Sortie& os, int ncomp) const
00388 {
00389   const Champ_base& champ=le_champ();
00390   int ni,nj,nk=-1;
00391   IntVect m(3);
00392   int i,j,k;
00393   int np,elem;
00394   int cmax=7;
00395   DoubleVect xi,yj,zk;
00396   DoubleTab Grille;
00397 // Lecture de xi,yj,zk dans un fichier .xiyjzk
00398   Nom nomfic(Objet_U::nom_du_cas());
00399   nomfic+=".xiyjzk";
00400   LecFicDiffuse ficijk(nomfic);
00401   ficijk >> xi;
00402   ni=xi.size();
00403   ficijk >> yj;
00404   nj=yj.size();
00405   if (Objet_U::dimension==3)
00406     {
00407       ficijk >> zk;
00408       nk=zk.size();
00409     }
00410   m=1;
00411   m(ncomp)=0;
00412   if (Objet_U::dimension==3)
00413     {
00414 // Grille ordonnee sur les faces des elements
00415       ni-=m(0);
00416       nj-=m(1);
00417       nk-=m(2);
00418       np=ni*nj*nk;
00419       Grille.resize(np,Objet_U::dimension);
00420       for(k=0; k<nk; k++)
00421         for(i=0; i<ni; i++)
00422           for(j=0; j<nj; j++)
00423             {
00424               elem=j+nj*(i+k*ni);
00425               if (ncomp==0)
00426                 Grille(elem,0)=xi(i);
00427               else
00428                 Grille(elem,0)=0.5*(xi(i)+xi(i+1));
00429               if (ncomp==1)
00430                 Grille(elem,1)=yj(j);
00431               else
00432                 Grille(elem,1)=0.5*(yj(j)+yj(j+1));
00433               if (ncomp==2)
00434                 Grille(elem,2)=zk(k);
00435               else
00436                 Grille(elem,2)=0.5*(zk(k)+zk(k+1));
00437             }
00438       DoubleVect valeurs(np);
00439       champ.valeur_aux_compo(Grille, valeurs, ncomp);
00440       for(k=0; k<nk; k++)
00441         {
00442           os << finl;
00443           os << "Coupe a K= " << k << finl;
00444           int n1=0,n2=0;
00445           while (n2<ni)
00446             {
00447               n1=n2;
00448               n2=::min(ni,n2+cmax);
00449               os << finl;
00450               os << "I=     ";
00451               for(i=n1; i<n2; i++)
00452                 os << i << "              ";
00453               os << finl;
00454               for(j=nj-1; j>-1; j--)
00455                 {
00456                   os << "J= " << j << " ";
00457                   for(i=n1; i<n2; i++)
00458                     {
00459                       elem=j+nj*(i+k*ni);
00460                       os << valeurs(elem) << " ";
00461                     }
00462                   os << finl;
00463                 }
00464             }
00465         }
00466     }
00467   else if (Objet_U::dimension==2)
00468     {
00469       ni-=m(0);
00470       nj-=m(1);
00471       np=ni*nj;
00472       Grille.resize(np,Objet_U::dimension);
00473       for(i=0; i<ni; i++)
00474         for(j=0; j<nj; j++)
00475           {
00476             elem=j+nj*i;
00477             if (ncomp==0)
00478               Grille(elem,0)=xi(i);
00479             else
00480               Grille(elem,0)=0.5*(xi(i)+xi(i+1));
00481             if (ncomp==1)
00482               Grille(elem,1)=yj(j);
00483             else
00484               Grille(elem,1)=0.5*(yj(j)+yj(j+1));
00485           }
00486       DoubleVect valeurs(np);
00487       champ.valeur_aux_compo(Grille, valeurs, ncomp);
00488       int n1=0,n2=0;
00489       while (n2<ni)
00490         {
00491           n1=n2;
00492           n2=::min(ni,n2+cmax);
00493           os << finl;
00494           os << "I=     ";
00495           for(i=n1; i<n2; i++)
00496             os << i << "              ";
00497           os << finl;
00498           for(j=nj-1; j>-1; j--)
00499             {
00500               os << "J= " << j << " ";
00501               for(i=n1; i<n2; i++)
00502                 {
00503                   elem=j+nj*i;
00504                   os << valeurs(elem) << " ";
00505                 }
00506               os << finl;
00507             }
00508         }
00509     }
00510   return 1;
00511 }
00512 
00513 DoubleTab& Champ_Face_implementation::trace(const Frontiere_dis_base& fr, const DoubleTab& y, DoubleTab& x,int distant) const
00514 {
00515   assert(distant==0);
00516   const Front_VF& fr_vf=ref_cast(Front_VF, fr);
00517   const Zone_VDF& zvdf=zone_vdf();
00518   const IntVect& ori = zvdf.orientation();
00519   const IntTab& face_voisins = zvdf.face_voisins();
00520   const IntTab& elem_faces = zvdf.elem_faces();
00521   int elem1,elem2;
00522   int face,i,f1,f2,f3,f4;
00523   int nb_faces = fr_vf.nb_faces();
00524   if (x.dimension(0)!=nb_faces)
00525     {
00526       Cerr << "The number of faces " << nb_faces << " on the remote boundary " << fr.le_nom() << finl;
00527       Cerr << "does not match the number of faces " << x.dimension(0) << " on the local boundary." << finl;
00528       Cerr << "Please, check if the boundary condition is not applied on wrong boundaries." << finl;
00529       Process::exit();
00530     }
00531 // assert(x.dimension(1)==Objet_U::dimension);
00532 
00533   if (x.dimension(1) == 1)
00534     {
00535       for (i=0; i<fr_vf.nb_faces(); i++)
00536         {
00537           face=fr_vf.num_premiere_face()+i;
00538           x(i,0)=y(face);
00539         }
00540       return x;
00541     }
00542 
00543   for (i=0; i<fr_vf.nb_faces(); i++)
00544     {
00545       face=fr_vf.num_premiere_face()+i;
00546       x(i,ori[face])=y(face);
00547     }
00548 
00549   for (i=0; i<fr_vf.nb_faces(); i++)
00550     {
00551       face=fr_vf.num_premiere_face()+i;
00552       elem1 = face_voisins(face,0);
00553       if (elem1 != -1)
00554         {
00555           if (Objet_U::dimension == 2)
00556             {
00557               if (ori[face] == 0)
00558                 {
00559                   f1 = elem_faces(elem1,1);

00562                 }
